Logo

The idea behind the logo was for it to be simple and recognizable. The up symbol tie back to the theme “It’s our turn to lead.” The final logo is simply 3 thick-outlined up symbols, stacking on top of each other, forming a shape of a tree. The logo works pretty well on different screen sizes.
